CustomField.description: Manual checkbox field used by Relationship Banking to override the rollup field used to condition the Relationship Banking alert banner on Account and Household lightning pages.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box to manually override the conditions triggering the Relationship Banking alert banner on Account and Household pages for Accounts/Households that do not have active Relationship Banking branch Financial Accounts but are managed by Relationship Banking.
CustomField.label: Relationship Banking
